title: Wayward_Manor-FLT
description:
ANSi JEDACiD



In Their 27th Year Of Glory, FairLight Released #1152



Wayward Manor (c) Moonshark, Inc: Supplied by: FAIRLIGHT: Release Date: 15/07/2014: Cracked by: FAIRLIGHT Game Type: Adventure

Packaged by: FAIRLIGHT Image Format: ISO

DISCS: 1 DVD Protection: Steam



System Requirements: Nobody knows!



Game information:



What started as a Lego play session between The Odd Gentlemen (The

Misadventures of P.B. Winterbottom) and Neil Gaiman (Sandman, Coraline)

soon became an unconventional way to tell a ghost story through a video

game. The game is a puzzle/adventure game hybrid, where the player learns

about the characters and world of Wayward Manor through observation

discovery, and puzzle solving. The game was first revealed on the website

WhoHauntsNeil.com, and has been slowly unveiling its story and world to a

whole new audience. Wayward Manor is Neil Gaiman's first foray into video

games



Wayward Manor invites you to jump into the afterlife of a disgruntled

ghost, trying to reclaim his house from its newfound owners. Set in the

1920s, this puzzle/adventure game transports players to an era of dark

screwball comedy where they must unlock the secrets of a twisted mansion

Players will discover the quirks of Wayward Manor's unwelcome guests and

choose how to prey on their darkest fears



The Budds, a dysfunctional family of misfits and eccentrics, have brought

their own abysmal possessions into your humble abode and stifled your

power. Each level is a playground for scares where players earn fear to

take back control of the room. If you want free reign over your mansion

once again, you must drive the Budds mad with fear using only your

imagination and their hideous belongings



Installation Information:



Burn or mount

Install

Play the game



NOTE: As usual, block the game exe in your firewall



/TEAM FAiRLIGHT



QUALITY, TRADITION AND PRIDE
